Uses of Interface
co.cask.cdap.api.data.DatasetContext

  • Packages that use DatasetContext 
    Package Description
    co.cask.cdap.api
    Interfaces for program and resource specifications, program lifecycle, runtime context and processors.
    co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib
    Collection of Dataset implementations available out-of-the-box in CDAP.
    co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib.partitioned
    Implementation of classes which use partitioned datasets (such as partition consumers) in CDAP.
    co.cask.cdap.api.flow.flowlet
    Interfaces used in flows and flowlets.
    co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce
    Defines MapReduce jobs.
    co.cask.cdap.api.service.http
    Defines a service for handling HTTP requests.
    co.cask.cdap.api.spark
    Defines APIs for defining Spark jobs in CDAP.
    co.cask.cdap.api.workflow
    For constructing workflows.
    co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch
    Interfaces for Spark plugins.
    co.cask.cdap.etl.api.realtime
    Packages for ETL Application Templates.
